## FormSheetNavButton interface

Represents a button used in the form sheet navigation bar.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface FormSheetNavButton 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [aria?](./form-sheet.formsheetnavbutton.aria.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> A description of the button's function |
|  [callback](./form-sheet.formsheetnavbutton.callback.md) | Function | The function thats being called on button click |
|  [color?](./form-sheet.formsheetnavbutton.color.md) | "primary" \| "accent" \| "warn" | <i>(Optional)</i> The color of the button |
|  [icon](./form-sheet.formsheetnavbutton.icon.md) | string | The material icon representing the button |
